oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Genetic Optimization of Photonic Bandgap Structures
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Goh, Joel
Fushman, Ilya
Englund, Dirk
Vuckovic, Jelena
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Physics - Optics
Physics - Computational Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We investigate the use of a Genetic Algorithm (GA) to design a set of photonic crystals (PCs) in one and two dimensions. Our flexible design methodology allows us to optimize PC structures which are optimized for specific objectives. In this paper, we report the results of several such GA-based PC optimizations. We show that the GA performs well even in very complex design spaces, and therefore has great potential for use as a robust design tool in present and future applications.
